title: What's your opinion on BTS' teaser photos for 'Dynamite'? - Quora

response.answer_text: EXTREMELY IMPRESSED AND LOVE IT! I love the retro vibe I am getting from it. They did such an amazing job and I am so proud of them. DYNAMITE is one of a kind. It’s produced by the members themselves and it’s also going to be let out during these bad times events that are occurring to the world. One day imma tell my kids or grand-kids that I lived through this event and have known BTS. I am proud of BTS work. Usually they’d also had to report it to Bang PD them but this time they get to fully do what they want. I am so happy and can’t wait to see their work! The photo’s are MIND BLOWING. Literally everything was trending. I love BTS efforts and their hard work. They deserve everything. LITERALLY everything. LOL after a few minutes of ARMYs freaking out on Twitter here’s Namjoon posting on Twitter. He must have been spying on us with all the hashtags trending.
